member.name: M:ParaglidingProject.API.Controllers.LevelsController.GetLevelAsync(System.Int32)
member.param: A level id as an integer found in route.
member.returns: An action result of type 202 which contains a level Dto. An action result of type 404 if no level was found.

member.name: M:ParaglidingProject.API.Controllers.LevelsController.GetAllLevelsAsync
member.returns: An action result of type 202 which contains a collection of type level Dto. An action result of type 404 if no levels were found.
